agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, April 16, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson HB 4031 Murr Relating to fees charged to a school district by a water supply or sewer service corporation. HB 3644 Murr Relating to transfer of irrigation water rights allowed by the Edwards Aquifer Authority. HB 3656 Murr Relating to the transfer of certain permitted irrigation water rights related to a certain portion of the Edwards Aquifer. HB 3663 Frank Relating to the powers and duties of the North Central Texas Municipal Water Authority. HB 4553 Lucio III Relating to the certificate of convenience and need decertification. HB 4669 Wilson Relating to the creation of the Northeast Burnet County Water District No. 1; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 4712 Miller Relating to the powers and duties of the Fort Bend County Levee Improvement District No. 7. HB 4705 Murr Relating to the territory of the Sutton County Groundwater Conservation District. HB 4707 Murr Relating to the amount of a tax imposed by the Sutton County Underground Water Conservation District. HB 4726 Dominguez Relating to the creation of the Cameron County Flood Control District; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes and to issue bonds. HB 4619 Toth Relating to the definition of a nonborder colonia. HB 1587 Geren Relating to the regulation of certain classes of retail public water utilities. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
